description: Where to send land registration applications and correspondence.

details.body:
Please use our standard addresses, unless:

  • your application is:
    • for Land Charges (including applications for a search of the index of proprietors’ names in form PN1)
    • for bankruptcy
    • for Agricultural Credits
    • the Procurement and Commercial Team
    • for Local Land Charges
    • to sign up to our Business e-services
    • to serve legal proceedings on the Chief Land Registrar
  • we have told you to send your applications or correspondence to an alternative address

Standard addresses

Address for members of the public

HM Land Registry Citizen Centre
PO Box 74
Gloucester
GL14 9BB

Royal Mail address for business customers

HM Land Registry
(Insert the name of your closest office)
PO Box 7803
Bilston
WV1 9QN

DX address for business customers

HM Land Registry
DX 427301
BILSTON 3

Offices

  • Birkenhead
  • Coventry
  • Croydon
  • Durham
  • Gloucester
  • Hull
  • Fylde
  • Leicester
  • Nottingham
  • Peterborough
  • Plymouth
  • Swansea
  • Telford
  • Weymouth

Business customers can submit applications online for faster processing, lower costs and an audit trail. Sign up to Business e-services.

Exceptions

Use the relevant Royal Mail address, or DX address below, if your application is:

  • for Land Charges (including applications for a search of the index of proprietors’ names in form PN1)
  • for bankruptcy
  • for Agricultural Credits
  • the Procurement and Commercial Team
  • for Local Land Charges
  • to sign up to our Business e-services
  • to serve legal proceedings on the Chief Land Registrar

Land Charges applications

Land Charges Department
PO Box 292
Plymouth
PL5 9BY

Land Charges Department
DX8249
Plymouth 3

Agricultural Credits applications

Agricultural Credits Department
PO Box 292
Plymouth
PL5 9BY

Agricultural Credits Department
DX8249
Plymouth 3

Bankruptcy applications

HM Land Registry Bankruptcy Unit
PO Box 292
Plymouth
PL5 9BY

HM Land Registry Bankruptcy Unit
DX8249
Plymouth 3

Sign up to Business e-services

Service Access Team

PO Box 650
Southfield House
Southfield Way
Durham
DH1 9LR

Service Access Team
DX 313201
Durham 24

Serve legal proceedings on the Chief Land Registrar

Chief Land Registrar

HM Land Registry Litigation and Indemnity Lawyers
PO Box 2079
Trafalgar House
1 Bedford Park
Croydon
CR90 9NU

Procurement and Commercial Group

HM Land Registry Procurement and Commercial Team
PO Box 292

HM Land Registry Procurement Unit
Plymouth
PL5 9BY

Local Land Charges

HMLR Local Land Charges

Processing Team
PO Box 326
Mitcheldean
GL14 9BQ

Contact form https://customerhelp.l...

Local Land Charges − light obstruction notice applications

Light Obstruction Notices

PO Box 3286

Twyver House

Gloucester

GL1 9HP
